children.type:
type ONLY_FOR_FORMAT =
  | string
  | number
  | boolean
  | ReactElement<any, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>>
  | Iterable<ReactNode>
  | ReactPortal
  | PromiseLikeOfReactNode

enableOnContentEditable.description: Whether to enable hotkeys when the target is a content editable element.

ignoreTags.description: Ignore hotkeys when the target is an input element.

preventDefault.description:
Whether to prevent the default behavior of the event.
Eg. to override browser hotkeys.

targetElement.description: The element to attach the event listener to.

command.description:
The key combination.
Supports shorthands: ⌥ ⇧ ⌃ ⌘

Shifted keys like ? and + are handled automatically

label.description: Label describing the function of this keyboard shortcut
